name: Live (itch) (Bloodmask)
description:
First person psychological horror game where narrative, exploration and resolution of puzzles predominate.

You are on live on your streaming, when you decide to get into an abandoned mansion with your friend who is in charge of holding your camera. When you get in, your friend dissapears after the lights go out and some screams started to be heard. Now, you must find him and get out of there.

In order to run away while finding your friend, you will need to solve a series of puzles by exploring the story throughout the old house and avoiding the possesed girl who will try to kill you.
